entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
